website_summaries.verdict: The ceramic coating on this pan helps you get your cakes out of the pan with ease, and it looks good, too.
pros: Comes in blue, red or black ceramic coating
A little bit bigger than some others, allowing you to put in the full batter without having to worry about it overflowing while in the oven
The ceramic nonstick works as advertised and is easy to clean
cons: This pan is only safe to 450º, which is sufficient for most cakes, but is a lower temperature rating than many other pans

customer_reviews.title: Bundt Pan
customer_reviews.text: Great bundt Pan. I greased and floured this pan first, and once done, my cake slid out easily. The ceramic was easy to clean. I’ve already made two cakes in it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Bonneau

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pan.
customer_reviews.text: This pan is great. I had a non-stick pan. No matter how much I greased & floured it, parts of the cake would stick, very frustrating. I've used this pan twice now and the cakes just fall right out. I lightly spray the pan with cooking spray. No more stuck cakes!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine LaRoux

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this pan much better than the Nordic product I bought. Nordic decidedly dominates the choices available on Amazon and elsewhere. The only caveat is that the design indentations of the pan are not all that pronounced, and the end result is that the cakes are rather nondiscript and plane looking.
customer_reviews.author: J.Nicoli

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bundt pan to try a pretty tricky paleo/keto recipe. I geased the pan with a little butter and dusted it with the flour - the cake came right out, no issues whatsoever, and it was beautiful. The bundt pan itself is pretty (I ordered the blue), and sturdy - I can see this lasting for years and years. I'm so glad I picked this over the other options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy with this bundt pan
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this bundt pan. The cakes we've made, both sweet and savory, have turned out well.. Thank you for a nonstick surface that isn't dangerous!
customer_reviews.author: Reader from Rice Lake

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, sturdy, and pretty to hang while awaiting next job!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, nice size, matches my kitchen, nice weight, sturdy, easy to clean. Heavier pan makes for better baking...and no non-stick coating to flake off. Have used light weight aluminum, silicone, and heavy cast iron bundt pans previously. All have their problems. This is the best of all types. Really enjoyed cooking in it, as well as cleaning it. and hanging on a hook on the wall, it decorates my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: scribbler

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for pound cakes!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pan to bake a 7up pound cake in for Thanksgiving. I had a similar pan years ago that I got rid of because my bake always stuck to the pan. Well, looks link I found a new bundt pan. I was amazed at the ease in which my cake came out of this pan. Cleaning too was easy. I am so in love with this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Ladysolitude

customer_reviews.title: It does not STICK!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Bundt cake pan! I had a Pampered Chef clay cake pan and it stuck every time and I was so tired of have of my cakes staying in the pan! So, I got on Amazon and found one that does not stick....at all!! I still spray it but even if I didn’t it wouldn’t stick! My son loves a lemonade cake and now he gets the whole cake!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia H

customer_reviews.title: Great Fluted Cake Pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan - it's super lightweight and easy to use and clean (always clean by hand!). I always give it a light coat of shortening when I use it (just like Mom taught me) and that works very well. I was hoping to get one of CasaWare's more "Bundt" looking pans when I bought this one, but it was all that was available back at the beginning of the pandemic, but I have no complaints and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: KarlB

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this pan has a stainless steel base, it is solid, but it is still light weight. The ceramic coating is continued over the entire inside and outside, and it is very smooth and slick feeling. Cannot wait to cook in it! I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I moved and was looking for a fluted pan like the one my Mom used to have. I bought one at a store but when I used my favorite cake recipe in it I could see the new pan was about 20% larger, so the cake looked misshapen because it was so small. I was so happy to find one that was like the one from about 1980. Actually, it's even better than Mom's, because of the nonstick coating.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Cake Bunt pan!
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time using a bunt pan ever. I love how easy the cake came out of the pan. It didn’t stick at all. I also love the color so beautiful. I am thankful I bought this bunt cake pan. Definitely going to be making a lot more bunt cakes for sure. Happy I picked this one to purchase. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyna King

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for Any Baker
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I must share no matter what I bake in or on casaWare, all my years of baking from the secrets my Grandmother from the early 1900s n from my Mother these pans are amazing out of this world. No matter what happens over bake, done just right, or a bit underbaked, warm pan, cold pan or the next day, slide out, fall out, to flip upside down nothing sticks. Best part simple cleanup warm soapy water soft cloth stand dry or towel ready for your next baking adventure. Plus I'm buying all of casaWare bake pans.
customer_reviews.author: GALMs

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for and older bundt pan
customer_reviews.text: I was having difficulty releasing my cakes in one piece when using my old (formerly reliable) teflon bundt pan. After a few fails I decided it perhaps wan't my rusty baking skills but rather might be the pan. I read several reviews and decided to buy this pan. So far I love it. I have only used it once but my cake was a complete success and came right out of the pan as advertised. Also, very easy to clean after use.
customer_reviews.author: Illawara

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Wanted
customer_reviews.text: We bought this pan primarily to make a family recipe fruit cake. In the past we have serious difficulty getting the cake out of the pans we have used. We tried this one and it is great. The cake came right out and was evenly cooked. We highly recommend this pan.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice-looking pan ...
customer_reviews.text: ... that makes a nice cake. I love the color of this generous-size pan which should work well for molded salads as well as cakes (several colors are available). The non-stick surface worked well, and the cake popped right out. If you need a new bundt-type pan, check this one out.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Grass

customer_reviews.title: What is this?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered with excitement of delivery this beautiful pan, but to my surprise when I took it out of the package. I knew immediately that this pan could not hold 12 cups of cake mix. I went to the sink and poured 12 cups of water in this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Shonda Lynette Beverly

customer_reviews.title: The best Bundt pan I’ve ever owned. Releases beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST bundt Pan I’ve ever owned! I make a special cake using a bundt pan and so many times the cake refuses to release. But not with this pan! I get so many compliments on my cakes now. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen H. Freedman

customer_reviews.title: You will love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bundt pan I have ever owned. Everything just comes out so easily. I always use baking spray on it. The cleaning is amazing....just rinses out...nothing sticks. I love it! I also bought one of the cookie sheets. That is great, too!
customer_reviews.author: teacher's wife

customer_reviews.title: Cakes Slide Right Out!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new bundt pan and spent quite a while researching all of the different ones. This pan got rave reviews so I decided to give it a try. It is truly a wonderful pan. NOTHING sticks to it. The cakes just slide right out. It's very easy to clean, is sturdy, and also nice looking. I would recommend this fluted cake pan to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lsap

customer_reviews.title: These are the best, nothing sticks.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best baking pans. I have never been disappointed with Casaware. It works so much better than that expensive brand. I have purchased multiple pieces and everyone is great. Nothing sticks at all and they bake really evenly.
customer_reviews.author: JTD19971

customer_reviews.title: So far it's great.
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once but so far I love it! My old one had a seam where two parts met near the bottom, which started to leak. Ugh! This one has no seams so I expect it to last a long time. Its light weight too, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: nonna

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my fluted bundt cake pan
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my fluted bundt cake pan, The first time I used it, my cake came out of the pan so easily and completely intact just like the instructions had stated. I would recommend this cake pan to anyone who likes to bake. It is well worth the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in every way.  Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Recently I researched fluted cake pans in which to make a pound cake. After my husband and I watched a movie about how unhealthy "plastic" is, I went on the hunt to find a healthy version of a cake pan. Well, CasaWare fit the bill! The composition of materials is safe to use from a health perspective. The color is pretty and craftsmanship/quality is very good as well. This is a durable yet lightweight (easily transportable). My pound cake turned out perfectly in color, texture, taste and dimension.
customer_reviews.author: GWM

customer_reviews.title: Great pan for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bake a lot of cakes and since it is now just me and my hubbie, a bundt cake is ample. I wore out my old pan and was looking for a good replacement. This pan is awesome and I have loved the cakes I bake in it.
customer_reviews.author: Aven C. Coulson

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan.,
customer_reviews.text: When I first used this pan there was a problem with the cakes sticking in the pan. I followed the instruction with pan. Then one day I decided to use Butter flavored Crisco and a light dusting of flour. I have not had a cake stick since. I make a lot of cakes and now I have 2 of these pan. Love love love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Koolestgram

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend buying it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bundt pan!! It's easy to clean and nothing sticks to it. Love that it doesn't have a bunch of chemicals. I'm definitely going to buy more of their baking pans.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hope

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Cakes cook evenly and come out of this pan super easy because of the cone shape center. I would definitely buy this again. I have used it about a 6 or 7 times without any issues at all. Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: robert grudberg

customer_reviews.title: amazing cake pan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and used it. Could not believe how well my cake comes out.
customer_reviews.author: ozgur

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan. Big enough so i don't have to make stray cupcakes with the leftovers. And no stick.... its a dream... flip and the cake on the cooling rack lickety split. I would recommend this pan to family and friends. 5 stars....
customer_reviews.author: FJM east coaster

customer_reviews.title: Bundt cake pan
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of cleaning my old intricate Bundt cake pan. This one is a vast improvement! Cake comes out clean. The pan is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda

customer_reviews.title: You have to grease and flour really well, so your cake doesn't stick.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my Southern pound cake and orange lemon pound cake recipe. These recipes required 12 cup pan.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick claims are 100% true!
customer_reviews.text: Truly nonstick! I've used this for 10c and 12c recipes and they've turned out great every time. I usually lightly butter the inside by rubbing the leftover butter from the paper wrapping on each stick into the grooves, and that is sufficient in preventing any cake from sticking. The design isn't the most impressive but the ease of use is really important to me. Quick and easy cleanup, as well.
customer_reviews.author: LHW

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Made the nicest Bundt cake, no sticking and it looked beautiful. Pan cleaned up really easy. Nothing stuck to the pan!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbesc

customer_reviews.title: 1-2-3 Clean-up!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. It releases cake like a dream. I was hoping it would be a bit more heavy duty but the lightness isn't a problem. Easy clean up. No scrubbing necessary. I'd like to get this in red as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in the ninja foodie 8qtI love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly to make a full size cake in my ninja foodie 8qt!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: No sticking.
customer_reviews.text: I did use Pam. Cake came out great. Cool for 10 minutes. Pass a knife along edges, invert on plate. No problem!
customer_reviews.author: joann a shimola

customer_reviews.title: Bundt Pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. It’s easy to clean and your cake comes out of the pan easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Miller

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Cake browns evenly and bakes thoroughly; cake comes out of pan easily. Pan so easy to wash!
customer_reviews.author: C. KISER

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Best Bundt cake pan I have ever used. Easy to clean. Light weight. Dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: lost

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. Very easily to clean. I use it a lot
customer_reviews.author: D Kempf

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Better then expected, nice looking, better then regular bundt pans, bought for my mom she loves it, it’s her go-to cake pan now
customer_reviews.author: S. BlizZzard

customer_reviews.title: The bakeware of choice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 in different colors..just to be fun. These ate the best I've had in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K.

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: What a great pan. It just arrived yesterday and I've already made two cakes with it. No spray necessary and both came out perfect. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: nice sturdy pan. The specks are pretty. This pan is what I was looking for. Just right!
customer_reviews.author: Country Girl

customer_reviews.title: Well made, thick and cleans up well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome bount pan I have used it several times and my cakes have always come out perfect with no sticking just a little spray coating in the pan and it cleans up just by wiping it out.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Geren

customer_reviews.title: Cake came out perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first experience using a bundt pan and my cake came out PERFECT using this pan. I had no issues with uneven cooking or sticking. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bommarito

customer_reviews.title: Non Stick
customer_reviews.text: I make a Zucchini Cake that is really sticky due to all the sugar, zucchini & nuts. It sticks in almost any bundt pan, but this one did not. Easy to clean, easy to handle, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looked well made thus was a Christmas gift fir my sister she loved it
customer_reviews.author: barbara laporte

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bundt pan I have ever bought or used. It works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Photogotcha

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and make your cake came out nice.
customer_reviews.author: Camie

customer_reviews.title: Makes beautiful cakes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve probably made hundreds of pound cakes and I sell them. They slip so easily out of this pan every time to make a beautiful cake. Washed up quickly
customer_reviews.author: Mb_chelle80

customer_reviews.title: nice non stick surface
customer_reviews.text: grat pan. nice non stick surface, and heavy gauge. it will be used often!!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pans I have used. Cake easily released. Pan was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: LaShawn M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cake pan
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time It cooked bunt cake evenly and cake slid right out of pan no sticking
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pan
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My cakes came out beautifully and evenly baked.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Love this pan!
customer_reviews.text: Made Monkey Bread for the first time and it came out perfect. Plus its pretty so I can keep it on display when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Pick

customer_reviews.title: Just received this pan and it works great. My cake came out of the pan with ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this pan and it works great. My cake came out of the pan with ease. Love this cake pan.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend as a house warming gift. Perfect gift for those that enjoy baking. My friend loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ojosverde

customer_reviews.title: healthy and it is ceramic NOT aluminum, cakes fall out very easty!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have made three different gluten free cakes and they have all turned out excellent!!!!!!!! Thank you for having a great product!!!!! HEALTHY
customer_reviews.author: Gizmo

customer_reviews.title: They advertise that it's ceramic but in fact it scratches very easily. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is not a well coated cake pan. They advertise that it's ceramic but in fact it scratches very easily. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: marley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan.....cake just slid right out.....will definitely be baking more cakes!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Diane Morfoot

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Nice heavy weight. The best non stick surface ever.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Nice !!
customer_reviews.text: I put very little oil,and the cake came out perfect,and I didn’t washed it,because was very clean,so,I bake a second cake with out putting oil,and it came out perfect too !!
customer_reviews.author: G. Casari

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I made monkey bread in this pan, it didn’t stick and was easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Shezzza

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Light pam spray and these pans work like a charm. Cook evenly and nothing sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bakes evenly and cake comes out clean. Deducted a star because the outside of the pan scratches easily...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.VRS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cakes came out great no sticking at all, love it
customer_reviews.author: Linda Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and pretty too!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bundt pan! I used it to make homemade monkey bread on mother’s day. You can’t get much stickier than that and it cleaned up like a dream The color is very pretty also!
customer_reviews.author: mhale23

customer_reviews.title: Cooked up well
customer_reviews.text: Liked it . Made pound cake in it. Was easy to remove from pan. Was a little wet
customer_reviews.author: BYbetty malone

customer_reviews.title: love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I used this pan to cook an Angle FOod cake. Turned out great. The cake did not stick it fell out os easy. Eas to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Sw

customer_reviews.title: Great Cake Pan!
customer_reviews.text: I have been so reluctant to buy a bunny pan...but this one is amazing! The cake came out of the pan with no effort at all! It is a beautiful pan!
customer_reviews.author: Pam S.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome pan
customer_reviews.text: Made a monkey bread in it today!! It was perfect!!!! I really like this pan😁
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the price. The pound cake just slid right out! Great addition to any kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Cake slides right out
customer_reviews.text: My cakes finally cook evenly and come right out without me having to bang on the bottom of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.text: You don't need any non stick spray . Cake comes right out.
customer_reviews.author: C. Monique Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, cake comes right out of pan, no sticking. Love this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie

customer_reviews.title: The shape and the size is great and the ceramic coating makes it a healthy choice
customer_reviews.text: The shape and the size is great and the ceramic coating makes it a healthy choice. You can not find it in any retail store.
customer_reviews.author: zoromax

customer_reviews.title: Not 12 cups—very important to know—for recipes
customer_reviews.text: BAKERS, PLEASE READ—not 12 cups in volume. the advertising is false. All bakers know how important the pan size is. I bought a 12-cup pan because I baked a cake that overflowed in a smaller pan, causing a great big mess in my oven. I measured the liquid volume twice, using 2 different types of liquid measuring cups. I meant to return it, but I missed the return window by a day. Busy with work.
customer_reviews.author: jmy-umma

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely PERFECT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pan! Perfectly coated - my cake just slid out. I was making a new recipe for a friend & was nervous about using this pan for the first time, but this pan out-performed my expectations. The darker color meant a little less cook time, so adjust your recipes accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: brocksgirl98

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Follow recommendations and brush with a little high-heat oil before using ( I use coconut oil). Made four cakes this week and they all slid right out! Beautiful browning! Bought another pan. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mm

customer_reviews.title: Fluted Cake Pan Works As Intended
customer_reviews.text: Such a lovely pan this is! I adore the bright red color and even more important how it performs! I have been wanting a nice fluted cake pan for a while now so decided on this casaWare Fluted Cake Pan and I am not sorry I made this purchase. So far I have only baked one cake but you can be sure more will follow. I wiped the inside down with vegetable oil before pouring in my batter and it slid right out of the pan - no problem. The instructions (I do read them sometimes) tell you not to use extra virgin olive to oil it - glad I read instructions because that is exactly what I reached for.
customer_reviews.author: micohawinds

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: This has turned out to be a very nice pan. The pan has a nice amount of weight to it. The ceramic inside is very nice and a breeze to clean. Its pretty on the outside too. I was concerned about the size of the pan but it held the batter for a full recipe of fruit cake (minus the dry fruit-yuk) perfectly. The pan is just a little deeper, rather than wider so my cake did take a bit longer to bake through. I am thrilled to be able to bake my mom's favorite cake and not be cooking in deadly aluminum. :0)
customer_reviews.author: WiseBear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bundt pan
customer_reviews.text: This is THE best Bundt pan I have ever owned. I have several very nice pans, but none this nice. I received it yesterday, washed it and made a pumpkin cream cheese pound cake, omg it came out of the pan perfectly. There were no sticking areas at all. I plan to donate my other pans to our church yard sale. There is no sense keeping the other pans I won’t be using them. Great pan, great clean up!
customer_reviews.author: Jiri

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and beautifully functional at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I made the decision to invest in a " lighter" Bundt pan, hoping it would function well. I can now report that form has met function beautifully, and I am very pleased with my CasaWare Blue granite Bundt pan. Thank you for such quick delivery, as it preceded the date of my baking a cake for an event. It baked a great cake!!
customer_reviews.author: Oxford Don

customer_reviews.title: Did not come out as a whole
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this product but was very disappointed. About 80% of the cake came out whole and looked great. 20% remained stuck in the pan, ruining the presentation of the cake. I followed the instructions; I oiled it with a brush and didn't flour dust it. It has to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Ziva Averbuch

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  A Bundt pan that releases my cake without making me cry...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried expensive Nordic ware pans to the lesser model Wilton Bundt pans, as well as every form of grease this side of the Musical. Often my baking experiences ending in tears and angry accusations hurled around my empty home. But this pan has given me back my favorite cake. It doesn't make me piece it back together and glue it with its glaze. I no longer have to flavor my cake with tears of sorrow. Bless you, casaWare!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Useful Pan!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful pan. I made a triple chocolate mousse bundt cake and all I did was spray it with regular cooking spray. It came out with no problem at all and cleaned like a dream. I don't for see any problems with sticking because I don't see any reason for the ceramic coating to get scratched and cause sticking. It is truly a lovely pan.
customer_reviews.author: paulaleg

customer_reviews.title: Casa Ware Flute Cake Pan
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this plan. I have baked two cakes which came out perfect. Make sure oil the pan in vegetable oil prior to adding the batter and it will come out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria C. Booze

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Pan!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this pan today and I am so happy that I decided on this one. My cake had no particles left inside, no sticking at all and the cake slid out with no problem. I highly recommend this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Alvanelle

customer_reviews.title: As good as it can gets!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third casaWare cake pan, No Nonsense bake ware! I greased and floured this pan first, and once done, my cake slid out easily. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm, easy to wash by hand
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problems using this pan with several different recipes and cake styles. It is easy to clean and I have seen no defects. I saw that some reviewers did not have as much luck, but I am happy with my bunt pan. I highly recommend this one to any baker.
customer_reviews.author: *CWS*

customer_reviews.title: Looked good but wasn't what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was confused when I received the product. It said "granite" and I expected the product to be much heavier then it was. I was disappointed that it wasn't granite and just coated in a granite-like film. Will probably have to lessen the total time I have to bake because the cake I did do was very dark when I pulled it out of the stove
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bundt Cake Pan
customer_reviews.text: I sprayed it with cooking oil and wiped it out to make sure it didn't pool at the bottom. Have made 2 cakes using it. Both released easily from the pan. Cooking time was a few minutes shorter than cake instructions. Made 2 pumpkin cakes.
customer_reviews.author: KDinSTL

customer_reviews.title: First Cake was perfect
customer_reviews.text: The color and the ceramic coating are the first thing I noticed -- it looks and feels like a piece of artwork, really. We made a classic looking cake with a simple glazed icing. The bake time and release from the pan were perfect on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sgalato

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan! Nothing sticks. It bakes evenly and comes right out when I turn it upside down. It is awesome for monkey bread--fits three cans of cut-up biscuits perfectly! I prefer to hand wash it to protect the coating, but it cleans up easily because nothing sticks to it.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good line of cookware. I first purchased the roasting pan and liked it so much I purchased the cake pan. The pan is light in weight as opposed to other cake pans I owned. It is definitely non-stick, I don't even spray with anything. It cooks evenly and the cake turns out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mr Massachusetts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bundt pan
customer_reviews.text: Worked as desired and advertised. 12cup bundt pan perfect for most recioes.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Cary

customer_reviews.title: High quality, beautiful, works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. It's beautiful but sturdy and so easy to clean. I've never had an easier time removing baked goods from a pan. Only used it once so far, but I'm really happy with the experience.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time to make a chocolate rum cake and I couldn't be more pleased. No sticking issues. Baked the cake thoroughly. Design is your average bundt design. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER

product_meta.title: casaWare Fluted Cake Pan 9.5-inch (12-Cup) Ceramic Coated NonStick (Blue Granite)
product_meta.description: Color:Blue GraniteThe 9.5-Inch CasaWare Fluted Cake Pan is a traditional favorite. Impress your family and friends with everything from beautiful cakes to pull apart breads! This pan has two nonstick ceramic coatings that make it durable and easy to clean. The colored nonstick ceramic surface is PTFE Free, Cadmium Free, Lead Free, PFOA Free and PFOS Free. The base of the Fluted Cake Pan is fashion colored, high heat resistant nonstick. USE and CARE Instructions: Before First Use- Remove all packaging materials and labels. Wash in warm soapy water. Rinse and dry thoroughly with a soft cloth. UTENSILS - Plastic, rubber, silicone or wooden utensils are recommended. Avoid using any sharp objects or metal utensils because they can scratch any non-stick surface. Always remove food from the pan before slicing or cutting. CLEANING - Cool completely before washing. Hand wash with a soft cloth or sponge and nonabrasive cleansers or liquid dishwashing soap in warm water. Rinse and then dry with a soft towel.
feature_bullets: This pan features our exclusive silver colored granite ceramic coated easy release baking surface. Its rich cream and brown accent flecks make this bakeware both high fashion and high function
Ceramic Coating is FDA, California Proposition 65 and European Union Approved. The Ceramic Coating is Cadmium, Lead, PFOA, PTFE and PFOS Free

This pan features our exclusive Blue Colored Granite ceramic coated easy release baking surface. Its rich metallic gold and brown dots make this bakeware both high fashion and high function. The exterior surface of the pan is coated with a complimentary high temperature non-stick Blue granite colored finish.

Double Coated Ceramic Surface over 0.6 mm carbon steel provides Long Lasting Durability and Scratch Resistance. Heat Tolerance to 450 degrees Fahrenheit, no peel off or blistering in high temperatures
Exterior: 12 x 10.5 x 3.5-Inch, Interior dimensions: 9.5 x 9.5 x 3-Inch. Hand Washing recommended, do not immerse in water. Do not microwave. Refer to product description for Use & Care Instructions
